alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 8:45AM MST until January 05 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation 1 to 4 inches valley floors, up to 6 inches benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will be possible through the day and into the Friday evening commute, particularly for bench routes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
